1086:3: iha atīśighraṃ sarvajñatāprāptukāmena prekṣāvatā tatprāpaka-hetu-pratyayebhyo'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ|

1086:7: yato hi sarve'pi sarvajñā eva na bhavanti|
1086:8: kiṃ tarhi kasyacit kadācit kiñcinmātraṃmūtatvāt sarvaṃ hi vastu hetusāpekṣameva|
1086:21: ucyate, mādṛśo jātyandhasadṛśastān darśayituṃ na śaknoti,

1086:37: sattvān avalokya tacchāntanirvāṇanagaraṃ prajvaladayogṛhavad dūraṃ tyaktatvād bhagavatām apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇahetustu sā mahākaruṇā eva|
1086:39: saṃprati upekṣābhāvanayā sarvasattveṣu anurāgaṃ dveṣaṃ ca nirasya samācittatā prathamaṃ niṣpādayitavyā|

1086:45: evaṃ manasikāreṇa madhyasthapakṣata ārabhya mitre śatrau cacittasamatāmeva bhāvayet|

1086:50: lokatrayasya sarvasattvānāṃ trividhaduḥkhatayā yathāyogam atyantaduḥkhitatvāt tadartha sarvasattveṣu sā bhāvanīyā|
1086:51: tathā ca ye tāvannākārakāste vividhacirantanadīrghakālikadāhādi-dukheḥṣu nimagnā eva bhāvato varṇitāḥ|

1086:54: manuṣyā api kāmaparyeṣaṇākārpaṇyād anyo'nyadrohopadhātakṛtaṃ priyaviprayogāpriyasaṃyogaṃ dāridrayādyutpannam aprameyaṃ duḥkhamanubhavanto dṛśyanto|
1086:56: ye ca vividhakudṛṣṭigahananimagnāste sarve'pi duḥkhahetutvāt prapatasthā iva atiduḥkhitā eva|

1086:60: tasmāt sakalameva jagad duḥkhāgnijvālāntarapraviṣṭam avetya yathā mama duḥkham apriyam anyeṣāmapi tādṛśam iti cintayatā|
1086:61: aho bata ! duḥkhitā mamaite priyasattvāstu kathaṃ tadduḥkhamuktāḥ syuriti svātmaduḥkhavat kṛtvā tannivāraṇecchākārayā karuṇayā samādhyavasthāyāṃ sarvacaryāsu vāpi sarvadā sarvasattvān bhāvayet|
1086:62: prathamaṃ tāvad mitrapakṣeṣu anubhūtapūrvoktavividhaduḥkheṣu anupaśyatā bhāvanīyā|
1086:63: tataḥ sattvasamatayāviśeṣamapaśyatā 'sarve sattvāstu me bandhubhūtā eva' iti paricintayatā madhyamapakṣeṣu bhavanīyā|

1086:67: prathamaṃ tāvad mitrapakṣe kṛtā maitrībhāvanā sukhasaṃyogecchākārā bhavati,
1086:69: tathā'bhyastā ca sā karuṇā kramaśaḥ sakalasattvābhyuddharaṇecchāṃ svarasena eva utpādayati|
1086:71: tad bodhicittaṃ tu dvividham-saṃvṛtaṃ paramārtha ca|
1086:72: tatra saṃvṛtaṃ tu karuṇayā sakalasattvābhyuddharaṇaṃ pratijñāya 'jagaddhitāya buddho bhaveyam' iti,

1086:82: “ taddvayoḥ sarvasamādhisaṃgṛhītatvāt sarvayogibhiḥ sadā avaśyaṃ śamathavipaśyane sevanīye|
1086:84: tadyathā-“mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ vividhasamādhayo darśitāḥ,
1086:89: tasmāt tatraiva āryasaṃdhinirmocane uktam “dhyānena hi kleśānāṃ vikrāntiḥ|

1086:101: āryavinayadharmaśravaṇaṃ ca vinā samādhimātreṇa saṃtoṣagrahaṇe tu ahaṃkāravaśād abhimāne patitāḥ janmajarārogamaraṇaśokaparidevanāduḥkhadaurmanasyakopāparimuktāḥ|

1086:104: tasmāt sakalāvaraṇaṃ vihāya viśuddhajñānodbhavakāmena śamathe sthitvā prajñā bhāvanīyā|
1086:110: āryamahāyānaśraddhābhāvanāsūtre'pi uktam-“kulaputra ! prajñāyām anupasthitau bodhisattvānāṃ mahāyānaśraddhā mahāyāne kathamapi utpatsyate (iti)
1086:112: kulaputra ! anena paryāyeṇāpi evaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yā kācid mahāyānaśraddhā mahāyāne utpatsyate sā sarvā tu avikṣiptacittena dharmārthasaṃcintanāt samutpannā veditavyā|“
1086:113: śamathaṃ vinā vipaśyanāmātreṇa yogicittaṃ viṣayeṣu vikṣipyate,
1086:117: ataḥ āryamahāparinirvāṇasūtre'pi uktam- “śrāvakaistu tathāgatagotraṃ na dṛśyate|
1086:122: śamathabalena ca vāyunā akṣobhyapradīpavad vikalpavāyubhiścittaṃ na kampate|
1086:125: akampiyaḥ śamathabalena bhoti śailopamo bhoti vipaśyanāya|
1086:127: tatra ādau saṃprati tena yoginā sukhaṃ śīghraṃ ca śamatha-vipaśyanāsiddhaye śamathavipaśyanāsambhāraḥ sevanīyaḥ|
1086:151: śrāvakasaṃvare pārājikapratividhāne'yogyaṃ kathanaṃ yadasti tasminnapi paścāttāpaḥ,
1086:156: tasmāt kaukṛtyābhāvaṃ kṛtvā bhāvanāyām abhiyogaḥ karttavyaḥ|
1086:157: kāmeṣvapi iha janmāntare ca bhāvino vividhadoṣān manasikṛtya teṣu vikalpaḥ pariharttavyaḥ|

1086:159: niścayena tatsarvasmin mayi ca aciraṃ viyoge bhāve sati mama tasmin katham adhyavasitādirbhaved iti bhāvanayā sarve vikalpāḥ pariharttavyāḥ|
1086:164: tatra kīdṛśaṃ satpuruṣam āśrayed iti cet-yo bahuśrutaḥ prasannavāk,
1086:168: ittham āryasaṃdhinirmocane-“yatheccham āryākhyānāśravaṇaṃ hi vipaśyanāvighnaḥ“ iti uktam|
1086:173: yasya nītārthasūtraneyārthasūtrādisunirṇayastādṛśe bodhisattve niḥśaṅke sati bhāvanāyām aikāntikaniścayo bhaviṣyati|
1086:174: anyathā saṃśayāndolitayānasthitastu śṛṅgāṭakamadhyagatamanuṣyavat kutrāpi aikāntikaniścayo na bhaviṣyati|
1086:175: yoginā tu sadā matsyamāṃsādi parihṛtya apratikūlaṃ bhojanaṃ niyatamātrakaṃ bhoktavyam|
1086:177: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī bhāvanākāle sarvam itikaraṇīyaṃ parisamāpyaṃ kṛtamūtrapurīṣaḥ kaṇṭakasvarādirahite mano'nūkūle pradeśe sthitvā mayā sarvasattvā bodhimaṇḍe niṣpādayitavyā iti viniścayan,
1086:178: sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtya daśadigavasthitān sarvabuddhabhodhisattvān pañcāṅgena praṇipatyāgrato buddhabodhisattvan paṭādau sthāpayitvā anyatra vā yathāvat tebhyaśca yathāruci pūjāstavanaṃ kṛtvā svapāpaṃ pradeśya,

1086:183: śiro nonnatam nāvanataṃ eka-pārśve niścalaṃ sthāpayitavyam|
1086:187: āśvāspraśvāsāstu na saśabdā nāpi sthūlā nāpi tvaritāḥ karaṇīyāḥ|

1086:190: bāhyaviṣayavikṣepaśānteḥ āntarālambane satataṃ svarasavāhi prītiprasrabdhivaccitta eva sthitistu śamatha iti ucyate|
1086:194: āryasaṃdhinirmocane'pi-“bhagavan kathaṃ śamathaparigaveṣaṇaṃ vipaśyanākauśalaṃ cāsti ? ucyate|
1086:196: tadyathā-ye sūtrageyavyākaraṇa-gāthā-udāna-nidāna-avadāna-itivṛttaka-jātaka-vaipulya-adbhūtadharma-upadeśa-vargāḥ bodhisattvebhya ākhyātāste bodhisattvaiḥ saṃśrutya saṃdhārya,

1086:203: tathā praviśya tatra bahuśaḥ sthitaḥ tasyāṃ kāyaprasrabdhicittaprasrabdhisambhavaśca yo'sti sa tu śamatha iti|
1086:208: cittavikṣepaṃ vihāya yathā cintitadharmaḥ teṣāmeva abhyantare samādhigocarapratibimbaṃ pratyavekṣate,
1086:211: tajjñeyarthe vivicyate pravivecanaṃ parikalpanaṃ paryavekṣaṇaṃ kṣāntiḥ,
1086:216: tatra śamathābhinirhārakāmo yogī prathamaṃ tāvat sūtrageyādisakalapravacanaṃ tu tathatāparāyaṇam,
1086:218: tathatāpravaṇama iti sarvaṃ saṃgrāhya tatra cittam upasthāpayet|
1086:219: etāvatā kiyadākāreṇa sarvadharmasaṃgrahabhute skandhādau tatra cittam upasthāpayet|
1086:226: tathā yatra icchālambanaṃ tasmin cittaṃ sthāpayitvā tatraiva uparyupari satataṃ cittaṃ sthāpayet|
1086:228: 'kim ālambanaṃ sugṛṇhāti līyate vā athavā bāhyaviṣayavyasekād vikṣipyate’ iti parīkṣitavyam|
1086:229: tatra yadi styānamiddhābhibhavād cittaṃ līnaṃ vā layābhiśaṅkā darśane tatkāle pramodya vastuni buddhapratimādau vā alokasaṃjñāmanasikaraḥ kartavyaḥ|
1086:230: atha layam upaśāmya yathāpi tatraiva ālambane cittālambanam atisphuṭadarśanaṃ bhavati tathā karaṇiyam|
1086:231: yadā tu jātyandhavad andhakārapraviṣṭapuruṣavad vā vinimīlitākṣavad vā cittam ālambanaṃ atisphuṭaraṃ na paśyati tadā līnaṃ veditavyam|
1086:233: anyamanasikāreṇa vā pūrvānubhūtaviṣayecchayā cittauddhatyaṃ vā auddhatyaśaṅkādarśanaṃ vā tadā sarve saṃskārā anityā duḥkhādimanosaṃvegavastu manasi karttavyam|
1086:234: tataḥ vikṣepaśāntiṃ kṛtvā smṛtisamprajanyarajjunā manonāgaḥ tadālambanastambhe eva bandhitavyaḥ|

1086:236: tadā ābhogaśithilikaraṇād upekṣayā tatkāle yāvadicchaṃ tiṣṭhet|
1086:237: itthaṃ bhāvitaśamathasya taccharīrasya cittasya ca praśrabdhirbhaviṣyati|
1086:241: īdṛśaṃ ca mantavyam bhagavataḥ sarvavacanaṃ tu subhaṣitam,

1086:247: prajñayā eva tattvamavagamyate prajñayaiva āvaraṇaṃ samyak prahīyate|
1086:248: tasmānmayā śamathe sthitvā prajñayā tattvaṃ paryeṣitavyam|
1086:249: śamathamātreṇa saṃtoṣo na karaṇīya iti vicāraṇīyam|
1086:253: āryasaṃdhinirmocane yathoktam “bhagavan ! kayā pāramitayā bodhisattvaḥ dharmaniḥsvabhāvatāṃ gṛṇhīyāt ?
1086:264: tasmāt tadyathā bhrama eva ayaṃ lokasya yadutāhaṃ memeti vicāritavyam|
1086:270: tatparamāṇuśo vibhāge paramāṇavo'pi bhāgaśaḥ svabhāvatāpratyavekṣamāṇāḥ svabhāvaniścayagrahaṇābhāvāt|
1086:271: tasmād anādikālikavitatharūpādyabhiniveśavaśāt svapnopalabhyamānarūpādipratibhāsavad bālānāṃ cittameva bahiḥ vicchinnamiva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ khyāti|
1086:272: paramārthatastatra rūpādistu na cittākāravyatirikta iti vicārayet|
1086:273: tad evaṃ traidhātukamidaṃ tu cittamātramiti cintayet|
1086:274: sa evaṃ cittameva sakaladharmaprajñaptiṃ niścitya tatra pratyavekṣya ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣito bhavatīti cittasvabhāvamapi pratyavekṣate|
1086:276: cittamapi paramārthaḥ satyaṃ bhavitum na yujyate|
1086:277: yadā hi alīkasvabhāvarūpādyākaropagrahaṇe cittameva citrākāraṃ pratibhāsate,
1086:279: yathā rūpādī alīkaṃ tathā cittamapi tadavyatiriktatvād alīkameva|
1086:280: yathā citrākāratayā rūpādayo naikānekasvabhāvāḥ tathā cittamapi tadavyatirekeṇa anikānekasvabhāvam|
1086:282: yathā cittamevaṃ sarvadharmā api māyāsvabhāvasadṛśā eva iti vicārayet|
1086:283: tena tathā prajñayā cittasvabhāve pratyevekṣamāṇe paramārthataḥ cittam abhyantare'pi nopalabhate,
1086:291: cittaṃ tu agrāhyam anirdeśyam, arūpam ca|
1086:292: anirdeśyam agrahyam arūpam ca yadasti tasya svabhāvaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ?
1086:293: tathā āryaratnakūṭe yathoktam-“kāśyapa ! cittaṃ tu parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate|
1086:294: yanna labdhaṃ tanna ālambyate yacca nālambyate|
1086:299: tad evaṃ parīkṣyamāṇe cittasya ādiṃ na samanupasyati,
1086:300: antaṃ na samanupaśyati madhyaṃ na samanupaśyati|
1086:301: yathā ca cittam anantamadhyaṃ tathā sarvadharmānapi anantamadhyam avagacchet|
1086:302: tena tadevaṃ cittam anantamadhyam avagamya kimapi cittasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate|
1086:303: yadapi cittaṃ parīkṣyate tadapi śūnyaṃ pratividhyati|
1086:305: tena tathā prajñayā sarvadharmasvabhāvasya asamanudarśanatvād rūpaṃ nityam anityaṃ vā,
1086:310: yathā rūpaṃ na vikalpayati tathā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñāneṣvapi na vikalpayati|
1086:313: tad evaṃ prajñayā parīkṣyamāṇo yadā yoginā kasyacid vastunaḥ svabhāvaparamārthaniścayo na gṛhyate,
1086:316: yaḥ prajñayā vastusvabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣya na bhāvayan,
1086:321: evaṃ samyakpratyavekṣaṇāt samyagyathāvajjñānāgnibhāve'raṇimanthanāgnivat kalpanāvṛkṣo dahyate iti bhagavatā uktam|
1086:322: tathā uktam āryaratnameghe-“sa evam apakṣālakuśalaḥ sarvaprapañcavigamāya śūnyatābhāvanāya yogamāpadyate|
1086:323: sa śūnyatābhāvanabahulo yeṣu yeṣu sthāneṣu cittaṃ prasarati,
1086:325: tāni tāni sthānāni svabhāvataḥ parigaveṣamāṇaḥ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati|
1086:326: yat cittaṃ tadapi parīkṣamāṇaḥ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati,
1086:327: yenāpi cittena parīkṣate tad api svabhāvataḥ śūnyaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ pratividhyati|
1086:335: tathā tayā prajñayā rūpādivastusvabhāvaṃ samyag yathāvat parīkṣya dhyāyati,
1086:340: prajñayā skalavastusvabhāvatāṃ prativīkṣya yasmād anupalambhaṃ dhyāyati-tasmāt prajñottaradhyāyī iti ucyate|
1086:343: aparasya parīkṣaṇīyasya darśanīyasya ca abhāvād uparatam,
1086:344: vitarka-vicāra-anabhilāpyaikarasena manasā svarasavāhinā anabhisaṃskāratastattvameva sphuṭataraṃ bhāvayan tiṣṭhet|
1086:346: yadāntarā rāgādīnāṃ cittaṃ bahirdhā vikṣapet tadā vikṣepaṃ viditvā śighram aśubhabhāvanādivikṣepam upaśamya śīghraṃ tathatāyāṃ cittam uparyupari praveśayet|
1086:350: atha styānamiddhābhibhavād yadā sphuṭapracāratayā līnaṃ cittaṃ paśyet,
1086:351: layābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā pūrvavat pramodyavastu manasikāreṇa śīghraṃ layamupaśamayet|
1086:352: punaḥ tad eva tattvālambanam atidṛḍhataraṃ gṛṇhīyāt|
1086:353: yadi tadā pūrvahasitaramitānyanusmṛtya cittamantarā samṛddhataṃ paśyed auddhatyābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā anityatādisaṃvegavastumanasikārād vikṣepaṃ śamayet|
1086:354: tataḥ punastatraiva tattve cittānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyāṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta|
1086:355: atha yadā layauddhatyābhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhisphuṭataraṃ tatraiva tattve cittaṃ utpādayate,
1086:357: yadi samapravṛtte citte sati ābhogaḥ kriyate,
1086:365: yadā ca vipaśyanāṃ bhāveyat prajñātiriktatarā bhavet,
1086:366: tadā śamathasyālpatvāt pravātasthita-pradīpavat pracalatvāccittasya na sphuṭaraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ bhavet|
1086:369: yadā ubhayaṃ samapravṛttaṃ tadā anabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tāvat sthātavyaṃ yāvat kāyacittapīḍā na bhavet|
1086:370: satyāṃ kāyādipīḍāyāṃ tadantarā sakalameva lokaṃ māyāmarīcisvapnajalacandropamapratibhāsavad dṛṣṭvā īdṛśaṃ cintanīyam|
1086:371: amī sattvāstu evaṃ vidhadharmagāmbhiryānavabodhatayā saṃsāre saṃkliṣṭāḥ|
1086:373: tathā kariṣyāmi' iti cintayan mahākaruṇāṃ bodhicittābhimukhīṃ kurvita|
1086:374: tato viśramya punarapi tathaiva sarvadharmanirābhāsaṃ samādhimavataret|
1086:378: evaṃ yogī anena krameṇa ghaṭikām ardhapraharam ekapraharaṃ vā yāvatkālecchāparyantaṃ tattvaṃ bhāvayan tiṣṭhet|
1086:380: tata icchayā samādherutthātuṃ paryaṅkam abhittvaivam anuvicintayet,
1086:381: amī dharmāḥ sarve paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvāḥ santo'pi saṃvṛtau vyavasthitā eva|
1086:384: “bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ|“ ityuktam|
1086:385: amī bālabuddhayo niḥsvabhāvavastuṣu bhāvādisamāropeṇa viparyastabuddhayo bhavanti|
1086:388: tataḥ sarvajñapadaṃ prāpya tān dharmatām avabodhayeyam|
1086:390: atha śanaiḥ paryaṅkaṃ bhittvā daśadigvyavasthitān sarvabuddhobodhisattvān praṇipatya tebhyaśca pūjāstotropahāraṃ kṛtvāryabhadracaryādimahāpraṇidhānaṃ praṇidadhīta|
1086:393: āryaratnacūḍe yathoktam-“sa maitrīvarmasaṃnaddho mahākaruṇāsthāne sthitvā sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhinirhāradhyānaṃ karoti|
1086:398: asati ca tathā buddhānām kṣetrādisaṃpattiryoktā sā kasya phalaṃ syāt|
1086:399: tasmāt sarvākāravaropetaṃ tatsarvajñajñānaṃ tu dānādyupāyena paripūryamāṇatvād bhagavān tat sarvajñajñānam upāyena paryantagatam ityavocat|
1086:400: tasmād bodhisattvena dānādyupāyo'pi sevitavyo na tu śūnyatā eva|
1086:401: āryasarvadharmavaipulye “yo'yaṃ maitreya ! ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bidhisattvānāṃ sambodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti,
1086:405: tat kiṃ manyase ajita! duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo'bhūd yena kapotārthena śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni ?
1086:408: bhagavān āha-yāni mayā maitreya ! bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitā-pratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacitāni,
1086:411: bhagavān āha-tvaṃ tāvad ajita ! ṣaṣṭikalpāna dānāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ,
1086:412: ṣaṣṭikalpān śīlapāramitāyaṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān viryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ|
1086:414: ekanayenaiva bodhiryaduta śūnyatānayeneti te caryāpariśuddhā bhavantītyādi|“
1086:415: upāyarahite sati bodhisattvaḥ prajñayā eva tu śrāvakavat buddhakāryāṇi kartuṃ na śaknoti|
1086:417: āryaratnakūṭe yathoktam-“tadyathā kāśyapa ! amātyasaṃgṛhītā rājānaḥ sarvakāryāṇi kurvanti,
1086:418: evameva upāyakauśalyasaṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya prajñā sarvabuddhakāryāṇi karoti|
1086:420: bodhisattvānāṃ mārgadṛṣṭerapyanyā tīrthikānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca mārgadṛṣṭirapyanyā|
1086:421: evaṃ tīrthikamārgadṛṣṭistu ātmādau viparyāsayuktatvāt sarveṇa sarvaḥ prajñārahito mārgaḥ|
1086:445: prajñayā gṛhītopāyaḥ muktiḥ iti“ vistarena uktam|
1086:446: bodhisattvasya prajñāmātrasevanaṃ tu śrāvakeṣṭanirvāṇapatitatvād bandhanavad bhaviṣyati|
1086:449: tasmād vāyupīḍitena agnisevanavad bodhisattvena viparyāsavāyumātraprahāṇatvāt sopyāprajñayā śūnyatā sevitavyā,
1086:451: yathā āryadaśadharmasūtre coktam-“kulaputra ! tadyathā yathā kaścinmanuṣyaḥ agniparicaryāṃ karoti,
1086:455: gurūkṛtya mānitaśca iti kṛte'pi eṣa dvābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ parigṛhītavya iti na cintayati|
1086:456: tat kasmāditi cet tannidhānne mayi kāyikaduḥkhaṃ cittadaurmanasyaṃ vā sambhāvyate iti cintanāt|
1086:460: tannidhānād ahaṃ bodhiṃ nirvarteyam iti cintanād“ iti|
1086:461: kevalam upāyamātrasevane'pi bodhisattvaḥ pṛthagjanabhūmeranuttīrṇatvād atyavabaddha eva bhaviṣyati|
1086:463: evaṃ mantraparigṛhītaviṣavad bodhisattvakleśe'pi prajñāparigrahabalena bhāvite sati amṛtikatā|
1086:464: punaḥ svabhāvena abhyudayaphalaṃ dānādi yadasti tatra kimuta vaktavyam|
1086:465: āryaratnakuṭe coktaṃ yathā- “tadyathā'pi nāma kāśyapa ! mantrauṣadhaparigṛhītaṃ viṣaṃ na vinipātayati evameva bodhisattvānām kleśaḥ prajñāparigṛhitatvād api na śaknoti vinipātayitum iti|“
1086:466: tasmād yena kāraṇena bodhisattva upāyabalena saṃsāramanutsṛjati tasmād nirvāṇe na patati|
1086:467: yasmāt prajñābalena sakalālambanaṃ prahīyate tasmāt saṃsāre na patati,
1086:469: tasmād āryagaganagañje'pi uktam-“tatprajñānena hi sarvakleśāḥ parivarjyante|
1086:475: atisamāhitāvasare vā dānādyupāyasevanāsambhāvanāyāmapi tatra prayogatatpṛṣṭhalabdhaprajñayoḥ yo'pi bhavati,
1086:478: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvānām ayaṃ hi prajñopāyayuganaddhavāhi mārgaḥ sarvasattvāvalokitamahākaruṇayā parigṛhītatvāt lokottaramārgaḥ sevyate,
1086:482: yataḥ samādhāne sattvāvalokitamahākaruṇāvalambane cittopasthāpanā sa eva upāyaḥ |
1086:483: yataḥ śāntipraśāntisamāpattiḥ sā tu tatprajñā “ iti vistaraḥ|
1086:484: māradamanaparicchede'pi uktam-“punaraparaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samutkarṣikaprayogastu prajñājñānena abhiyogaṃ karoti|
1086:487: upāyajñānena yaḥ sarvasattvaparipāko'pi prayojyaḥ“ iti vistaraḥ|
1086:490: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato'sya saḥ||
1086:493: bodhisattvanām prajñopāyavidhireva sādhyamadhikṛtya tatprayogasaṃsāre sthito'pi asti,
1086:496: paramārthabodhicittotpādārtha pūrvavat nityaṃ kāle kāle śamathavipaśyanāprayogo yathāśakti bhāvanīyaḥ|
1086:497: āryagocarapariśuddhisūtre-sarvāvasthāsu sattvārthakāribodhisattvānāmanuśaṃsā yathā nirdiṣṭā tathā saṃnihitasmṛtyā sarvadā upāayakauśalaṃ bhāvitavyam|
1086:498: tādṛkkaruṇopāyabodhicittabhāvakaḥ sa iha janmani avaśyaṃ viśiṣṭo bhavati|
1086:509: atha ṛddhibalena anantalokadhātūn gatvā bhagavato buddhān pūjayati|
1086:518: tena tādṛkkaruṇopāyabodhicittāni ca nityam ādareṇa ciraṃbhavitāni kramaśaḥ cittasaṃtāne atipariśuddhakṣaṇotpādena paripākabhūtatvād araṇimanthanāgnivat samyagarthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantaṃ gamanaṃ bhūtvā lokottarajñānasakalavikalpajālāpagamanaṃ niṣprapañcadharmadhātuprasphuṭāvagati,
1086:530: adhimuktibhūmau tu adhimuktivaśāt pravṛttirvyavasthāpitā na tu abhisaṃskāreṇa|
1086:532: tathā prathamabhūmipraveśaḥ tadanantaraṃ bhāvanāmārge lokottareṇa tatpṛṣṭhalabdhajñānena dvābhyāṃ ca prajñopāyabhāvanākrameṇa bhāvanāpraheyasaṃcitāvaraṇasya sūkṣmasūkṣmataravyavadānād uttarottaraviśiṣṭaguṇaprāptaye adhobhūmipariśodhanena tathāgatajñānaparyantaṃ praviśya,
1086:535: evaṃ krameṇa eva cittasaṃtānapariśuddhiḥ āryalaṅkāvatāre'pi uktā|
1086:545: iti prekṣāvān bhagavati buddhe sakalaguṇākare śraddhām utpādya tadguṇapariniṣpattyarthaṃ svayaṃ sarvān prayatnān kuryāt|
1086:546: tasmād bhagavatā evamuktam-“tadetat sarvajñajñānaṃ karuṇāmūlaṃ bodhicittahetukam upāyaparyavasānam“ iti|
1086:548: vivecya gṛṇhanti subhāṣitāni haṃsāḥ payo yatpayāṃsi prahṛṣṭāḥ||
1086:551: prakāśya yat prāpi mayā śubham asamapaddhitam|
